Articles.Content:
So I tried going to Dres.

https://imgur.com/a/ld2dy85

On a close approach. That black ring you can barely make out behind and below of my spacecraft? That's the rings of Dres. The planet itself is gone.

Saving and Reloading made Dres reappear, but the rings are still black and somehow obscured by Dres.

https://imgur.com/a/OLoOA27

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
Let's be fair; it was never there for starters.
Perhaps they remove Kerbin in the next patch ? Will clearly increase FPS !

I just had the same with Ike. Got to Duna SOI and set up an Ike flyby to put me in Duna orbit. Timewarped to Ike SOI in map view. When I changed to flight view, Ike was nowhere to be found. Save and load brought it back.
